channel.title: Netbeans
channel.description:
Hello guys,
ive been programming with java for quite a while now, but with notepad. So recently i switched to netbeans for java programming, but here's my problem
at projects i get to see my source but when i click on it i can't find all the files on netbeans. could someone teach me how to?
sorry for being a noob i'm new to netbeans.

item.title: Netbeans
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Netbeans
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You need to drag & drop your source files into the IDE (make sure you package them properly too), after that you wont have to do this again (for your current projecT).

Read full topic
